intro.text: Music is a sacred, elemental, and dynamic force – a euphoric common language that can elevate and guide us all to something greater and more noble than ourselves. In Arabic, Tanweer means “enlightenment” and I have founded the Tanweer Festival to bring together artists and audiences from around the world that understand the important role music has in unlocking ancient and sacred wisdoms – wisdoms which have the power to enlighten and inspire the world.
intro.caption: Bodour bint Sultan bin Mohammed Al Qasimi
